        public static String get(String key,
                         Object... args)
        Provides the string with the given key from the resource bundle for the current locale and uses it as first argument to MessageFormat.format, passing in the optional args and returning the result.
        Parameters:

        args - optional arguments for the message
        Returns:
        localized formatted string
